Single Flavor Test:  1% & 2%

60/40 | 0 Nic | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | asMODus C4 RDA | Organic Japanese Cotton

\_ \_ \_ \_ \_

1 Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Tester Bottle

\- Aroma: Aroma Intensity ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Description: Matcha Butter Cream

\- Knuckle: Buttery Sweet Cream & Matcha

​

‚ñ∫Vape ‚Äì 1% Tester

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Natural. Heavy, Buttery, Sweet Milky Dairy Cream paired with Rich Notes of Mild Culinary Grade Matcha flvr - with hint of Tea Like Tannin. Medium Rounded Body with a Creamy Mouth Feel.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Identifiable Off Notes

\- - - - - - - -

‚ñ∫Quick Notes 2%: Flavor Intensity 5/5, Sweetness 3/5. Denser Buttery-ness. Butter is Dominate and Matcha falls under Flvr vs With. Thicker Mouth Feel and Body.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

2 Week Steep ‚Äì 1%

​

‚ñ∫Vape - Changes

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Flavor Description: Changes - Milky Cream has become Softer / Matcha flavor pushed to Top. Milky and Smooth Mouthfeel vs Creamy.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: None

‚ñ∫Quick Notes 2%: Same as 1% tester / Butter cream flavor still dominate over Matcha flavor.

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

3 ¬Ω Week Steep

​

‚ñ∫Vape ‚Äì Changes

\- Flavor Intensity: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è

\- Sweetness: ‚óºÔ∏è‚óºÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è‚óªÔ∏è ‚Üì

\- Flavor Description: Natural. Lightly Tannic & Green; Culinary Matcha (Upfront) mixed into a Soft & Lightly Buttery Milky Cream. Medium Bodied with a Smooth and Soft Mouthfeel.

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Identifiable Off Notes

\- Heavy Creamy Dairy becomes Softer and Milder as Matcha Flavor ‚Üë

\- Pairings with other Heavier Creams may Dull Matcha Note\*

\- - - - - - - -

‚ñ∫Quick Notes 2%:  Changes = Tannic Qualities, followed by Fainter Matcha flavor. Matcha flavor becomes Subdued and Less Bright. Soft & Mellow Cream notes remain.

‚ñ∫Mixing % Estimate\*

Usage: 0.5% min ‚Ä¢ 1% med ‚Ä¢ 2% max
